email_chain.subject: Freight Offer for Steel Coils from Busan to Long Beach
email_chain.body:
Dear Sophia,

I hope this email finds you well. We are pleased to present you with a freight offer for 12,000MT of Steel Coils from Busan to Long Beach on CIF terms. The vessel we propose is the MV OCEAN HORIZON, with a DWT of 85,000 and LOA of 220m. The laycan is set for October 10 to October 15, with a loading window of 48 hours. The initial freight quote is USD 45.50 per MT.

Please let me know if this works for you or if you need any further details.

Best regards,
Liam Carter
Sea Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Steel Coils from Busan to Long Beach
email_chain.body:
Hi Liam,

Thank you for the prompt offer. Given the current market conditions, I was hoping for a more competitive rate. Could you consider lowering the freight to USD 43.00 per MT?

Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate per day and any potential delays at the loading port?

Looking forward to your reply.

Best,
Sophia Martinez
Maritime Traders

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Steel Coils from Busan to Long Beach
email_chain.body:
Dear Sophia,

Thank you for your response. Considering our long-term relationship, I can offer a revised freight rate of USD 44.00 per MT. The demurrage rate is set at USD 15,000 per day. There are no anticipated delays at the loading port at this stage.

Please note that the laycan remains October 10 to October 15, and the loading window is still 48 hours. I trust this revised offer meets your expectations.

Best regards,
Liam Carter
Sea Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Revised Freight Offer for Steel Coils from Busan to Long Beach
email_chain.body:
Hi Liam,

Thank you for the revised offer. We can agree to the USD 44.00 per MT, provided the laycan is strictly adhered to. Could you confirm the stem details and any potential delays?

Best,
Sophia Martinez
Maritime Traders

email_chain.subject: Re: Confirmation of Stem Details for Steel Coils Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Sophia,

I confirm that the laycan will be strictly adhered to, and the stem details are as follows: loading at Busan on October 10, with a 48-hour loading window. There are no anticipated delays at this stage.

Please let me know if you need any further clarifications.

Best regards,
Liam Carter
Sea Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Finalization of Steel Coils Shipment Agreement
email_chain.body:
Hi Liam,

Thank you for the confirmation. We agree to the terms and will proceed with the booking. Please send over the contract for review.

Best,
Sophia Martinez
Maritime Traders
